mapper.insert: INSERT into Board(boardNo, title, contents, writer) VALUES (SELECT NVL(MAX(boardNo)+1,1)from board), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT boardNo, title, contents, writer, regDate, viewCnt WHERE Board ORDER BY boardNo desc, regdate desc
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET viewCnt = viewCnt+1 WHERE boardNo = #{boardNo}
